Backend.Server

Class ToolShopDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • Backend.Server.ToolShopDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDBCredentials

    public class ToolShopDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDBCredentials
    The Database controller. Responsible for updating and creating the database as well as holding the functions for retrieving information form the database
    Since:
    April 11, 2019
